channel.title: Help Me Make My Server (Great Reward!)
channel.description:
Hey guys im new to this stuff and i need helping make my server im not excalty new to this stuff but i dont get it i do everything it says on the tut(s)and it dont work first of all i am using a wireless router and my compile dont work not sure why and im also not sure about port forwarding i done it but when ever i try open my server it comes up as 0.0.0.0:w/e so if you help me there will be a great reward for you on my server or website i might even donate u some money :) thanks so please help need some quick replies and good coders :)
EDIT:btw it's my first time on this forum posting something so if it's in the wrong section forgive me.

item.title: Help Me Make My Server (Great Reward!)
item.dc:creator: @freeky freeky
item.description:
@freeky wrote:

ok zeroh give me your msn and we will talk my msn is freeky_enemy@live.co.uk[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 24, 2009, 04:50:05 pm[/size][hr]if there is someone else that can help me code my server or make me a source please add my email freeky_enemy@live.co.uk

Thanks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 24, 2009, 04:51:41 pm[/size][hr]bump get this back up please!

item.title: Help Me Make My Server (Great Reward!)
item.dc:creator: @Girona Girona
item.description:
@Girona wrote:

[quote=“Tatemo, post:14, topic:280026”]lolz u need JDK if its not working and u need to portforward and get no-ip and use one of the ten billion tuts[/quote]You need JDK and JRE to both compile and run a server successfully.

Also, you cannot offer rewards for help.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Me Make My Server (Great Reward!)
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

[quote=“freeky, post:5, topic:280026”]ok can u have team viewer if u have u can see whats wrong with my compiler

When ever i press compile it says

Note:stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note:Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details
Press any key to continue…[/quote]

This means your compiler did work.

Read full topic
